CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 7, 1953, pg. 23, reads: "Still Unbeaten - Members of the Matadors unbeaten basketball team which will play the Bruno All Stars at Ammon Center Monday night for the benefit of the March of Dimes are shown above. Front row, left to right: Donald Graves, Jerry Hughes, Craig Copeland, Ben Oaks and James Woods.  Back row: Robert Jones, Ernest Johnson, Franklin Reed and Willie Graham. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Matadors basketball team, front row from left: Donald Graves, Jerry Hughes, #7 Craig Copeland, Ben Oaks, James Woods; back row: Robert Jones, #5 Ernest Johnson, Franklin Reed, and Willie Graham, posed with basketballs in gymnasiums
